column3: The shoes are very cute, but after the 2nd day of wearing them the tongue started ripping. After the 3rd day of wearing them the plastic on the side ripped. If you’re going to buy these I don’t recommend wearing them on days where you will do a lot of walking or they might rip

column6: I chose the white model with black back trim and I can say that the shoes look even more beautiful up close, my size is 38, 38.5 and I ordered size 38 and it fits me well. Fast shipping, the package arrived even earlier than expected, excellent price since they cost at least 10 to 15 euros more around.

column6: I usually buy Guess shoes and I have never had problems with the size, in this case, however, I received some shoes that, despite being the usual size I take, are very small, almost two sizes smaller, so unwearable.

column1: adidas Women's Retrorun Shoes Running, Core Black/Cloud White/Alumina, 8 UK
column3: True to size. If between I'd probably go with your lower end i.e 8-8.5 go 8. I wore these right out of the box for a little over 2 hours, most of which was walking around and they were incredibly comfortable no rubbing and I did not find any issue with the tongue being too stiff as I have seen mentioned in other reviews.
column6: Perfect right outta the box

column3: This is the second pair I bought. Loved the first pair however not pleased with the 2nd pair. There is no padding in the tongue part of the shoe and it is causing irritation to my skin where it rubs. I am very disappointed and will not buy them again.

column1: adidas Women's Retrorun Shoes Running, Core Black/Cloud White/Alumina, 8 UK
column3: I love these shoes so much, it's my second pair, pure comfort!  Thank you Amazon!
column6: Wow!

column1: Aravon Women's Betty-AR Oxfords, Stone, 5.5 UK
column3: I have hard to fit feet and often a wide fitting shoe looks too big and bulky.  These shoes were comfortable right away with no pressure points.  I use them for run around shoes, going to the store, etc.  They look casual but are more attractive than a running shoe.  They have a nice rounded toe box and go with any kind of outfit.  I am very happy with them.
column6: Comfortable and attractive

column1: adidas Women's Retrorun Shoes Running, Core Black/Cloud White/Alumina, 8 UK
column3: 足が22cmのため、このサイズを展開しているブランドが少なく購入。デザインは可愛くて満足だが、履き心地は残念。小さいサイズあるあるで、パーツは大きいサイズのものを流用しているように思える。・ベロが長すぎて、足首を曲げるたびにこすれて、すり傷ができる（スニーカーソックスではNG）・インソールの踵から土踏まずのアーチまでの距離が長すぎて、つま先寄りにアーチが来るため、後ろ重心に感じる今回は靴下や中敷きを工夫して履こうと思うが、可愛くてもリピートはしない。
column6: Because my foot is 22cm, there are few brands that offer this size, so I bought them. The design is cute and satisfying, but the comfort is disappointing. It seems like they used parts from larger sizes in the small size. - The tongue is too long, it rubs against the ankle every time you bend it, causing abrasions (not suitable for sneaker socks) - The distance from the heel to the arch of the insole is too long, causing the arch to come too far forward, making me feel the weight on the back of the foot. I plan to try wearing them with special socks or insoles, but even though they are cute, I won't buy them again.
column7: Cute but disappointing in various ways

column1: Aravon Women's Betty-AR Oxfords, Stone, 5.5 UK
column2: My right foot fits size 11 fine but not the same for the left foot
column3: I really need 11 1/2 but these shoes do not come in half sizes.  My right foot fits size 11 fine but not the same for the left foot.  The only issue is the blue insole - my feet perspire and the blue colour runs into my socks.  Also, the round laces look nice but they do not remain tied; they need a knot in the bow to maintain the tie.  They are very attractive shoes and do not look huge in size 12. Thank you. CHL.
column6: My right foot fits size 11 fine but not the same for the left foot
column7: My right foot fits size 11 fine but not the same for the left foot

column1: adidas Women's Retrorun Shoes Running, Core Black/Cloud White/Alumina, 8 UK
column2: 軽くて履き心地がすごくいいです！
column3: 最初少し硬かったけど、すぐに履きやすくなり、軽くて歩きやすいです！
column6: At first, they were a bit stiff, but they quickly became comfortable to wear and light and easy to walk in!
column7: Lightweight and very comfortable to wear!

column1: Aravon Women's Betty-AR Oxfords, Stone, 5.5 UK
column3: Great quality and comfort shoesI was so thrilled when I got my new shoes last week! I had bought a pair of a RAVON shoes over two years ago at an expensive shoe store and I did not regret spending the money because they were perfect walking shoes and they gave me plenty of support and I have a bunion on my left big toe and I had plenty of room for that foot. Tmy new ones just like my old pair as far as being comfortable and they keepI got me balanced. By the way my original pair that are 2 1/2 years old are still good but I am using them to mow grass in because I feel safe walking in them. I wanted new ones because I needed some pretty ones that weren’t grungy looking. I am 67And being balanced is ver  important to me. I highly recommend these shoes because of the wonderful quality and comfort and I got them on sale! What a deal so I feel like I won the lottery! Also I neglected to mention they are very classy looking. Very well-made and beautiful and striking.
column6: Great quality and comfort shoes

column1: adidas Women's Retrorun Shoes Running, Core Black/Cloud White/Alumina, 8 UK
column3: I would NOT recommend these for running. They have zero support and I could feel the rocks in the ground through the shoe. They are also shaped really weird. The sole protrudes out in the back all around the heel and makes your foot appear much larger than it should.
column6: NO SUPPORT! NOT FOR RUNNING!

column1: Aravon Women's Betty-AR Oxfords, Stone, 5.5 UK
column2: Not as supportive as I had hoped for.
column3: These shoes are cute online but in person...not so much.The shoe is super light weight and flimsy feeling.  Because of this, it feels as if there is no support/stability.My partial orthotic fit well into the heel of the shoe.The shoe not only has aqua-colored accents (shoe string eyelets) but also has an aqua liner throughout the shoe. As I was slipping my socked foot into the shoe for the first time, that inner liner sort of bunched up and made the shoe top look distorted. As if the liner pushed forward and down causing the upper portion and toe of the shoe to twist upward.  Not a nice look.  At that point I decided that I didn't want to struggle with getting the shoe on each time.  I'm returning them.
column6: Not as supportive as I had hoped for.
column7: Not as supportive as I had hoped for.

column1: adidas Women's Retrorun Shoes Running, Core Black/Cloud White/Alumina, 8 UK
column3: Very comfortable! Absolutely love the look and feel of these shoes. They run slightly too big. But, that doesn't take away from the comfort. I'm not sliding around inside them. I'm able to work in them well and workout in them great. Excellent pair of shoes.
column6: Great pair of shoes!

column1: Aravon Women's Betty-AR Oxfords, Stone, 5.5 UK
column2: Can’t wear due to Poorly designed insoles
column3: I like the style and weight of this shoe, just right for wearing all day.  Good quality components.  However, as other reviewers have said, the insole makes wearing these shoes impossible.  The surface of the insoles is some attractive suede fabric which looks like it will be very comfortable.  In fact, the fabric prevents your foot from sliding into the shoe.  I forced my feet in and my toes were uncomfortably turned in on them selves, I could not possibly wear these shoes like that.  I tried stockings and different types of socks with the same difficulty, I just could not push my foot smoothly into the shoe.  Then I tried taking the insole out of another pair of sneakers and putting them in the Aragon’s.  My foot slid right in but when I walked there was no arch support.  Dilemma, should I send them back or go buy 6 or 7 sets of insoles at the drug store to see if any of them will work.  So disappointing.
column6: Can’t wear due to Poorly designed insoles
column7: Can’t wear due to Poorly designed insoles

column1: Aravon Women's Betty-AR Oxfords, Stone, 5.5 UK
column3: I have been trying to find a casual, but not too casual, shoe for work. I wanted an athletic shoe fit in a shoe that doesn't look like an athletic shoe. This is pretty close. It works well with chinos or colored denim. They would not look right with "dress" pants, but for business casual, it's good. I'm always between 8 and 8.5. I went with an 8 and they fit perfectly.  I also need good support and these are reasonable. I have another pair of Aravon shoes (mary jane) and they also work well. I think this is good brand.
column6: What I was looking for

column1: Aravon Women's Betty-AR Oxfords, Stone, 5.5 UK
column2: but it's frequent enough with certain socks that it becomes annoying to have to stop and pull my socks up ...
column3: I'd give them 5 stars if it weren't for the fact that the material on the inside of the shoe keeps pulling on my socks, it's not all the time, but it's frequent enough with certain socks that it becomes annoying to have to stop and pull my socks up which find their way down into my shoes after walking for 10-15 min, also the laces don't seem to stay tied, my recommendation is to buy socks that are really snug around your ankles and use a different pair of laces.... besides that, I think the shoes are really cute, love the choice of brown and blue, I think they work well together, also the shoe has pretty good support, I use my own inserts which fit well in the shoe, but like I said if you don't, the original inserts are pretty good
column6: but it's frequent enough with certain socks that it becomes annoying to have to stop and pull my socks up ...

column3: Two years ago I bought this same exact shoes.  I wore them always when choosing a stylish athletic shoe. column1: Naturino Unisex Babies Cocoon First Walker Shoe, Zucca, 1.5 UK
column3: An sich wunderschöner Schuh, auspacken und direkt meinem Kind angezogen. Das Kind geht 2 Schritte und fängt bitterlich an zu weinen... Sofort Schuhe ausgezogen und mal geschaut was da los ist. Es war nen für Kleinkinderschuhe wirklich großer Knick in der Inneneinlage der sich auch nicht wirklich begradigen lässt. Bedauerlich, wo doch der Schuh an sich nicht im Discounter Sektor liegt. Da hätte ich wirklich mehr erwartet.
column6: A beautiful shoe in itself, I unpacked it and put it on my child right away. The child takes 2 steps and starts crying bitterly... I immediately took off the shoes and checked what was going on. There was a really big crease in the insole of the toddler shoes that couldn't be straightened out. It's regrettable, especially since the shoe itself is not in the discount sector. I really expected more.

column3: These shoes are cute and jus fine. I wanted to comment on the company actually. I bought these for a wedding for my son to wear and they weren’t going to arrive in time.  I reached out to Amazon with no luck. I finally contacted the company directly and they said they didn’t think they could get them to me in time because of how the process works. However, I literally received these the very next day. Whoever I spoke to, thank you, you obviously went out of your way to get these pulled and shipped to me and I can’t thank you enough. They made it on time and the wedding was gorgeous!!My son kept the shoes on all night and now wears them when he wants to dress up casual  ..he says they are comfy and shoe laces are long enough he can tie them easily

column1: adidas Daily 3.0 Skate Shoe, Grey, 3 US Unisex Little Kid
column2: Great shoe - great price - runs big
column3: Great looking shoe at a great price! I got these in the gray with black stripes and the black with white stripes. Looks exactly like the ones I got from the store that were $20 more. They run big. I wear a women’s 7 in most shoes. I measured my foot on the big kids Adidas size chart and according to it, I should get a 6.5. I got the 6 because they didn’t have any other sizes and based on other reviews from women I was hoping they would work out. They’re big. I measured them against the men’s 7 I had from the store and there wasn’t much difference between the 6 and 7. They measured the same as the men’s 6.5 I had from the store. I would’ve ordered a 5 if they were available. It’s hard to guess with the weird sizing situation. Hopefully putting in some insoles will help because I want to keep them.
column6: Great shoe - great price - runs big

column1: ASICS Women's 1012A699-003_42 Running Shoes, Black, 7.5 UK
column2: 厚底は慣れるまでは慎重に。
column3: 厚底とアーチが足を前に出す機能をゆっくり走る時に強く効果を感じますね。ただ初の厚底だったので、走る環境も考えて走らないといけないと思います。いつも通りに走ってしまうと着地不安定となり転倒してしまうかもしれません。転倒して顔面強打、頬骨ヒビ入りましたので、慎重に徐々に慣らしていきましょう。
column6: I feel a strong effect when I slowly run in thick-soled shoes with arch support that propel the foot forward. However, since this is my first time wearing thick-soled shoes, I think I need to consider the running environment and not run in the usual way. If I run as usual, the landing may become unstable and I may fall. I had a hard fall with a facial impact, causing a fracture in my cheekbone, so let's gradually get used to it carefully.
column7: Be cautious until you get used to the thick soles.

column1: ASICS Women's 1012A699-003_42 Running Shoes, Black, 7.5 UK

column6: Actually, a very nice and comfortable shoe from Superfit. I don't know why the manufacturer made the sole so cheaply. After wearing them a few times, the white toe cap already came off. This should be a no-go for expensive brand shoes.

column1: Beck Boys Bones Wellington rain boots
column3: Mein 4- jähriger Sohn liebt diese Stiefel und möchte seine anderen Schuhe nicht mehr tragen. Er hat in den Stiefeln keine Schweißfüße wie in einigen anderen Schuhen. Er läuft sehr gut  darin und hat auch bei eisigen Temperaturen keine kalten Füße. Die Stiefel sind meiner Meinung nach von einer sehr guten Qualität und deshalb etwas schwerer. Meinen Sohn stört das überhaupt nicht. Er kommt perfekt rein und wieder raus (das war bei anderen Stiefeln problematischer). Das Highlight für ihn ist natürlich das blinken. Ich werde die Stiefel auch wohl im nächsten Winter kaufen.
column6: My 4-year-old son loves these boots and doesn't want to wear his other shoes anymore. He doesn't get sweaty feet in these boots like in some other shoes. He walks very well in them and doesn't have cold feet even in icy temperatures. In my opinion, the boots are of very good quality and therefore a bit heavier. My son doesn't mind that at all. He gets in and out perfectly (which was more problematic with other boots). The highlight for him is, of course, the flashing lights. I will probably buy these boots again next winter.

column1: Beck Boys Bones Wellington rain boots
column2: Perfekt auch für etwas breitere Kinderfüße
column3: Beck Gummistiefel begleiten uns nun schon einige Jahre. Passform super, vorallem, wenn die Füße etwas breiter geschnitten sind. Klare Kaufempfehlung. Die Leuchtfunktion beim Gehen ein Highlight für die Kleinen. Schuhe halten die Füße im Herbst und Winter schön warm. Wir haben dieses Modell schon das zweite Jahr im Einsatz.
column6: Beck rubber boots have been with us for several years now. Great fit, especially when the feet are a bit wider. Clear recommendation to buy. The light function when walking is a highlight for the little ones. The shoes keep the feet nice and warm in autumn and winter. We have been using this model for the second year now.
column7: Perfect even for slightly wider children's feet

column1: Beck Boys Bones Wellington rain boots
column3: Habe die Gummistiefel für meine beiden Kinder gekauft. Und sie wurden ausgiebig im Urlaub, am Strand und in Pfützen, getestet. Die Gummistiefel haben den Test bestanden und bekommen 5 Sterne.★ entsprechen der angegebene Größe, genug Platz auch mit dicken Socken★ Wasserdicht★ halten kleine Füße warm und trocken★ schönes Design★ blinkende Sohle, sehr gut sichtbar im dunkelnKann diese Stiefel nur empfehlen 👍
column6: I bought the rubber boots for my two children. And they were extensively tested on vacation, at the beach, and in puddles. The rubber boots passed the test and receive 5 stars. ★ Correspond to the stated size, enough space even with thick socks ★ Waterproof ★ keep little feet warm and dry ★ nice design ★ flashing sole, very visible in the dark. Can only recommend these boots 👍

column1: Beck Boys Bones Wellington rain boots
column3: Ich habe diese Gummistiefel nun das zweite Mal bestellt, aus den ersten ist mein Söhnchen herausgewachsen. Die Gummistiefel sind sehr robust: Sie haben ein ganzes Kindergartenjahr vergleichsweise gut überstanden! Sie halten warm und trocken. Es stimmt, dass die Stiefel etwas schwerer sind als andere Gummistiefel, aber meinen Sohn hat das nicht gestört oder beim Laufen behindert. Ein paar kleine Kritikpunkte: Die Blinkfunktion hat im Laufe des Jahres den Geist aufgegeben... auch riechen die Stiefel leicht nach Chemie, wenn sie noch ganz neu sind.
column6: I have now ordered these rubber boots for the second time, as my little son has outgrown the first ones. The rubber boots are very robust: they have comparably survived a whole year of kindergarten very well! They keep warm and dry. It is true that the boots are a bit heavier than other rubber boots, but that didn't bother my son or hinder his walking. A few minor points of criticism: The flashing function gave up during the year... also, the boots smell slightly of chemicals when they are brand new.

column1: Beck Boys Bones Wellington rain boots
column3: Die Gummistiefel sind sehr schön verarbeitet und unser Sohn liebt sie. Nebst der guten Verarbeitung ist der Leuchteffekt sehr ansprechend und unser Sohn ist gut zu sehen. Der Leuchteffekt bleibt auch bei starker Verschmutzung bestehen und die Schuhe lassen sich sehr gut reinigen.
column6: The rubber boots are very nicely crafted and our son loves them. In addition to the good workmanship, the light effect is very appealing and our son can be easily seen. The light effect remains even after heavy soiling, and the shoes are very easy to clean.

column1: Beck Boys Bones Wellington rain boots
column3: Mein Sohn ist sehr zufrieden. Die Stiefel sind gut verarbeitet und halten im Winter die Füsse schön trocken und warm. Sie sind von innen vollständig mit einem kuscheligen Kunstfell gefüttert und von außen im ganzen mit durchsichtigem Gummi überzogen. Das Dinosaurierskelettmuster ist schön und perfekt für alle Dinofans. Die Ferse blinkt beim gehen, was im dunklen Winter nur vom Vorteil sein kann. Der Stiefel fällt etwas groß aus. Sollte vielleicht lieber eine Größe kleiner bestellt werden. Alles im ganzen ein guter Wintergummistiefel zum relativ günstigen Preis.
column6: My son is very happy. The boots are well made and keep his feet nice and dry warm in the winter. They are fully lined with a cozy artificial fur inside and completely covered with transparent rubber on the outside. The dinosaur skeleton pattern is beautiful and perfect for all dinosaur fans. The heel blinks when walking, which can be very beneficial in the dark winter. The boot runs a bit big. You may want to order a size smaller. All in all, a good winter rubber boot at a relatively low price.

column1: Beck Boys Bones Wellington rain boots
column3: Sohnemann brauchte neue Gummistiefel und diese fand er optisch sehr schön, also bestellt.Leider passten die ersten nicht, weshalb wir sie dann nochmal größer bestellt haben.Er ist jetzt sehr zufrieden, sie blinken, halten trockenbund sind innen auch noch etwas flauschig und daher etwas wärmer als andere Stiefel.
column6: My son needed new rubber boots and he found these ones very nice-looking, so we ordered them. Unfortunately, the first ones didn't fit, so we ordered them bigger. He is now very happy, they blink, keep dry, and are slightly fluffy inside, so they are a bit warmer than other boots.

column1: ASICS Men's EVORIDE 2 Running Shoe, French Blue Hazard Green, 7 UK
column2: 足裏へのダメージの少ないシューズ
column3: １８キロほどを３回走りましたが、クッション性がよくて足裏の疲労度はさほどでもありませんでした。他の軽量の靴と比べると足へのダメージが少ない気がします。微妙な重さ（２６ｃｍで２２０グラムくらい）なので、もっと軽い靴が欲しい人にはホカオネオネのＲＩＮＣＯＮ３の方がいいかもしれません。ソールの踵に近い部分は３回目で少々ささくれ立っています。耐久性は期待しないほうがいいかも。親指にやんわりと「前に行け」という指令が入るようになっているので走りやすい靴ではあります。
column6: I ran about 18 kilometers three times, but the cushioning was good and the fatigue level of the soles of my feet was not too high. Compared to other lightweight shoes, I feel that there is less damage to the feet. The weight is subtle (about 220 grams at 26 cm), so for those who want lighter shoes, Hoka One One's RINCON3 might be better. The area near the heel of the sole is slightly rough after the third use. It might be better not to expect durability. It is an easy-to-run shoe because there is a gentle instruction to 'go forward' on the big toe.
column7: Shoes with little damage to the soles

column1: ASICS Men's EVORIDE 2 Running Shoe, French Blue Hazard Green, 7 UK
column3: 価格が5000円台になったので購入しました。グライドライドよりかなり軽い感じですが、前方への進む感じはやや少ないように思います。スピード練習でも使えそうなので、サブ４用のトレーニングに使用開始しました。
column6: I purchased them because the price dropped to the 5000 yen range. They feel much lighter than the Glide Ride, but I think the feeling of moving forward is slightly less. They seem usable even for speed training, so I started using them for Sub 4 training.
